source_objects.description: Need to learn marketing? Start with courese that introduce you to market research, marketing fundementals and more.
source_objects.title: Marketing Fundamentals

items.title: Marketing Plan & Strategy: ZERO to HERO Overnight
items.headline: Content & Email Marketing can be hard if you don't know what works. No more guessing - More sales. Market better today!
objectives_summary: You'll know how to create a marketing plan.
You'll know how to create a sales funnel + scripts/marketing plan.
You'll know how to word your sales videos in this marketing plan tutorial.

items.title: Network Marketing Done Right Makes Millions! Learn How Now!
items.headline: I will teach you the skills needed to boost your network marketing business and start making thousands monthly.
objectives_summary: Confidently talk to customers
Retain customers
Create loyal and satisfied customers

items.title: Sales Training Course: Learn Basic and Advanced Sales Skills
items.headline: SALES TRAINING - Learn the Practical and Tested Skills of Pitching, Responding to Rejection and Closing the Sale
objectives_summary: Present an effective and clear elevator pitch.
Respond effectively to rejection.
Understand your prospects mindset to learn how to respond effectively.

items.title: Local Marketing Blue Print
items.headline: Learn how to dominate your competition with local Internet Marketing

items.title: Internet Marketing - Everything You Need To Become An Expert
items.headline: Become an expert and dominate internet marketing in a few small steps - Get The Internet Marketing Lifestyle Free eBook
objectives_summary: Learn the ways to find your audience with internet marketing
Know how to attract visitors and make them convert
Dominate social media with valuable content

items.title: Local Business Marketing: Help Businesses With Marketing
items.headline: Learn how to help local businesses with their local online marketing needs.
objectives_summary: You'll learn how to get started helping local businesses.
You'll learn about the different ways you can structure your business to make the most money possible.
You'll learn to set up your business correctly from the beginning to make you sure hit the ground running when reaching out to local business owners.

items.title: How to double your sales with psychology! backed by research

visible_instructors.title: Ferdinand Brand
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional teacher & researcher in learning & innovation
visible_instructors.name: Ferdinand

items.headline: In only one hour you'll learn how you can apply psychology to increase and double your sales for your (online) business
objectives_summary: You will be able to improve your sales based on science and psychology
You will able to apply the tought principles in practice
You will be able to find improvements in your marketing / salesplan

items.title: Get More Restaurant Customers
items.headline: How to fill more covers - without using discounts or gimmicks in your marketing
objectives_summary: How to attract new customers to your restaurant
How to build relationships and get customers to come back

items.title: Online Courses Marketing Fundamentals Program 2021

visible_instructors.title: Money Makers Academy
visible_instructors.job_title: Engineers looking to teach people how they can make money online easily and be their own boses
visible_instructors.name: Money Makers

items.headline: Turn Your Course into A Passive Income Machine with the Right Marketing Strategy
objectives_summary: Building sellable content via effective content layout
Pricing strategies that work
Building your content pyramid to get people started quickly with your learning content

items.title: Accelerated Course in Modern Copywriting and Content Writing

visible_instructors.title: Fred Rouhani
visible_instructors.job_title: Business and Corporate Storytelling Professional Trainer
visible_instructors.name: Fred

items.headline: Win the crazy attention competition, write remarkable copies, generate gainful leads, break the walls of formulas
objectives_summary: Straightforward and without the fuss, write sensational copies that win attention, engagement and action
Gain influential power with three unique and exclusive tools: Strategy worksheet, copy development framework and copywriting canvas
Master the top five types of copywriting (direct response, marketing, SEO, brand and technical copywriting)

items.title: CMMP Exam: Marketing Management --> Practice Test 2021
items.headline: Strategic marketing |  Product concept |  Marketing buzz | Discretionary income |  Market expansion | Diversification |
objectives_summary: Able to Solve Marketing Management Based Question

items.title: Luxury Marketing
items.headline: How to build a powerful, sustainable, luxury brand
objectives_summary: Marketing a Destination

items.title: CPA Marketing: Drive Traffic To Your CPA Offers For Profit
items.headline: Learn how start and run successful Cost Per Action ad campaigns.
objectives_summary: You'll learn about how to start your CPA campaigns.
You'll also learn how to drive traffic to your CPA offers for profits.
You'll learn how to select your CPA network.

items.title: Tapping Into The Power of Inspired Marketing
items.headline: 6 Steps to Transform How You View Marketing and How You Do Marketing
objectives_summary: What Inspired Marketing is and how it differs from Traditional Marketing.
6 Steps to help you tap into Inspired Marketing Ideas to market your business.
How the motivation and intention behind your marketing can make all the difference.

items.title: How to Create a Video to Sell Your Product or Service
items.headline: Learn To Easily Create Powerful Sales Videos, Even If You’ve Never Made One Before!
objectives_summary: Maximize product sales with the effective use of video sales letters
Understand the different types of 'VSLs' and choose the best style for your campaigns
Create, from start to finish, high converting VSLs for any product or service

items.title: Story Selling: Supercharge Your Sales with Stories

visible_instructors.title: Basim Salim
visible_instructors.job_title: Executive Coach: Launch Your Profitable Online Course
visible_instructors.name: Basim

items.headline: Learn to create stories that build credibility and trust with your prospect and persuade them to take action and buy.
objectives_summary: Create a powerful story that resonates with your prospects that persuades them to buy.
Build a credible brand based on a story that prospects can relate to and remember.
Learn the elements of a story that sticks and gives you instantly loyalty to you and your products.
